summary: I WAS TRAVELING AT 35 MPH ON A CITY STREET AND HAD TO STOP QUICKLY.  I APPLIED THE BRAKES AND RECEIVED NO RESPONSE AS THEY WENT TO THE FLOOR.  THE ANTI-LOCK SYSTEM FINALLY STARTED TO RESPOND RIGHT BEFORE IMPACT WITH THE BACK CORNER OF A VAN.  THIS RESULTED IN EXTENSIVE DAMAGE TO MY PICK-UP AND THE VAN.  I'M STILL WAITING ON THE INSURANCE COMPANY TO FIX MY TRUCK.   *NM
